pageSubtitle: Answers to the most common questions about Dicilo.

q1.question: What is Dicilo.net?
q1.answer: Dicilo.net is an innovative digital platform that connects businesses and consumers in an efficient ecosystem. With the help of modern technologies and AI-powered tools, Dicilo supports the trade of products and services, improves brand visibility, and provides end customers with personalized product recommendations. The platform brings suppliers and buyers together globally, enabling a transparent, secure, and dynamic exchange.

q2.question: How can I register with Dicilo.net?
q2.answer:
Registration is quick and easy:

  • Visit the Dicilo.net website.
  • Choose your profile: Private Customer, Basic, Retailer, or Premium.
  • Enter your email and password and confirm your registration.
  • Customize your profile; businesses also receive a personalized landing page for their products.

q3.question: What subscription plans does Dicilo.net offer?
q3.answer:
Dicilo.net offers four main plans:

  • Private Customer: For users who want to receive personalized offers.
  • Basic: For small businesses with basic sales or that are growing.
  • Retailer: For small and medium-sized businesses with a manageable number of products.
  • Premium: For larger companies with extensive catalogs.

All paid plans provide access to marketing tools, statistics, professional support, and personalized recommendations.

q4.question: What are the benefits for sellers on Dicilo.net?
q4.answer:
Sellers benefit from, among other things:

  • Registration of up to 600 products in 20 main categories.
  • AI-powered marketing tools to optimize visibility.
  • Monthly statistics and training on relevant topics.
  • Personalized promotion via newsletters and social media campaigns.

q5.question: How do I receive offers on Dicilo.net?
q5.answer: End customers receive personalized newsletters with suitable recommendations twice a month. Business customers receive monthly reports on statistics, campaign performance, and platform activities.

q6.question: How does technical support work?
q6.answer:
Support is tiered according to the plan:

  • Email Support: Monday to Friday.
  • Premium Support: For users of higher plans, Monday to Saturday.
  • AI Assistant (in preparation): 24/7 support for real-time inquiries and immediate help.

q7.question: How is product delivery handled?
q7.answer: Delivery is coordinated directly between the buyer and seller. Dicilo.net supports the communication process and helps with questions about delivery methods, costs, or timelines.

q8.question: Is a subscription mandatory?
q8.answer: The use of basic functions is free. A paid subscription is required for advanced tools such as statistics, marketing analysis, exclusive offers, and deeper platform features.

q9.question: How can I expand my business with Dicilo.net?
q9.answer:
Dicilo.net offers businesses strategic advantages such as:

  • Access to an international target audience.
  • Targeted campaigns based on customer segments.
  • Comprehensive data analysis to optimize business decisions.
  • Tools for targeted visibility enhancement.

q10.question: On which social networks is Dicilo.net active?
q10.answer: Dicilo.net is present on: WhatsApp, Telegram, Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, LinkedIn, X (Twitter), YouTube, Pinterest, and Twitch.

q11.question: What are the benefits of the Dicilo.net AI assistant?
q11.answer:
The AI assistant (Beta) will provide the following functions:

  • 24/7 availability.
  • Personalized recommendations based on user behavior.
  • Support with scheduling, reminders, and general questions.

q12.question: What marketing tools does Dicilo.net provide?
q12.answer:
Businesses get access to:

  • Professionally designed social media posts.
  • Segmented newsletter campaigns.
  • Customizable graphics for branding and promotion.
  • Analysis of campaign performance and reach.

q13.question: Are there discounts on annual memberships?
q13.answer: Yes. Depending on the plan, discounts of 5% to 15%, special promotions, or additional free months are available.

q14.question: Can I register my products in multiple categories?
q14.answer: Yes, Dicilo has 20 main categories available, provided the products meet the respective requirements.

q15.question: How does the recommendation system work?
q15.answer: Users can rate and recommend products. These recommendations are included in segmented newsletters and serve as a signal of trust for other consumers, as well as increasing the likelihood of a sale.

q16.question: Does Dicilo.net support businesses in entering new markets?
q16.answer: Yes. Through targeted advertising, social media strategies, and access to international user groups, Dicilo.net supports market entry and expansion.

q17.question: What statistics do business customers receive?
q17.answer:
Business customers receive monthly reports on:

  • Performance of their landing page.
  • Reach and effectiveness of their campaigns.
  • User interactions with their offers.
  • Recommendations and conversion potential.

q18.question: Does Dicilo.net also support startups?
q18.answer: Yes. Dicilo.net offers particularly accessible plans, training, strategic advice, and tools to support startups in brand building and scaling.

q19.question: How secure are transactions on Dicilo.net?
q19.answer: Dicilo relies on high security standards. All transactions go through internal review mechanisms to ensure transparency, reliability, and protection for buyers and sellers.

q21.question: Does Dicilo.net offer a currency calculator?
q21.answer: Yes. We provide an integrated currency calculator that allows you to check exchange rates in real-time.

q22.question: How do I contact Dicilo.net for questions or advice?
q22.answer: You can contact us via the website, email, or social media. Our team will be happy to assist you with any questions about plans, registration, campaigns, and the optimal use of the platform.
